title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 28.0 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 28.0 - Introduction

State Regulations

This Part is hereby promulgated to provide standards designed to provide greater protection for consumers and raise the standards of integrity in the bail business. Failure by a licensee to comply with the requirements of this Part may be considered as evidence of misconduct, malfeasance, and untrustworthiness within the meaning of Insurance Law section 6802. Notes

York State Register November 20, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 47, eff. 3/19/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
